name: HACKGYVER
description:
This game is submission for Weekly Game Jam #138. 

So something finished after a long procrastination. It's not original and has little to do with the theme, but it's finished and i dare to say somewhat enjoyable .. maybe ? 

But I learned an important lesson. Never try to make music on my own ! My ears bleed even now. So I used some songs from Synthwave Music Pack which is made by c152 Synthwave Music. Everything else is made by me.
